allow: Bash(python -c "from omegaconf import DictConfig, OmegaConf; from rl_web_agent.env import WebAgentEnv; cfg = OmegaConf.load(''rl_web_agent/conf/config.yaml''); print(''Config loaded successfully''); print(''Accounts:'', cfg.environment.accounts); env = WebAgentEnv(cfg.environment); print(''WebAgentEnv created successfully'')")
